channel.title: Vpn on Damian Rajca
channel.description: Recent content in Vpn on Damian Rajca

item.title: Home Lab access over VPN
item.description: Hi! It’s going to be my first real blog post! I’m going to start from something technical, quite useful in developers world. From time to time I faced some problems with connecting to my lab, located in my flat. The situation is because my internet provider uses NAT network. It’s not easy to get access to this network for example over SSH. There are some options, for example team viewer.
